title: Miss Universe, Joe Biden, Justin Timberlake, Kwanzaa and more.
itunes:title: Miss Universe, Joe Biden, Justin Timberlake, Kwanzaa and more.
description:
Good morning and welcome to the ride! Today The Steve Harvey Morning Show is open and all good. Pelosi has asked the House Committee Chair to proceed with articles of impeachment against 45. Plus, will the real Joe Biden please stand up? Did Justin Timberlake go to far or nah? Trump is angry at the Democrats and tweets about it. Kwanzaa Comedy is here with suggestions to get people to show up to your Kwanzaa Party. Pimpin' is back with his mistletoe jacket giving us his NFL week 14 picks. This Sunday the 2019 Miss Universe Pageant takes place in Atlanta. Today in Closing Remarks, The CEO talks about the law of attraction. Have a great weekend!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
